titleStmt.title: Mr. Challenor his confession and speech made upon the ladder before his execution on Wednesday the fifth of July 1643. in Corne-hill jnst [sic] against the Royall Exchange. It is this day ordered by the committee of the House of Commons in Parliament concerning printing, that the confession of Richard Challenor be printed by Peter Cole. July 5. 1643 John White.
titleStmt.author: Chaloner, Richard, d. 1643.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Peter Cole at the signe of the Glove and Lyon in Cornhill neare the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Chaloner was involved in Waller's plot.
reproduction of the original in the British Library.
